      • GetCurrentUserProfile

        public Profile GetCurrentUserProfile()
        Get the current User Profile that is active for a given client. If not profile is active, then a default profile is created and set as the active profile.
        Returns:
        Current User Profile

        public Profile GetUserProfile(java.lang.String user)
